description:
Get filtered water quickly, when you need it. The QuickDraw high-flow capacity filteration system is easy to use - just fill and squeeze the soft bottle to get clean water to drink, and give it a shake to clean out the filter. When it's empty, it collapses down small to not take up much room in your pack.

  • Hollow fibre filter has a high surface-area that allows water to flow quickly through a 0.2 micron effective pore size
  • Do not allow the cartridge to freeze after initial use
  • Fast flow rate when reservoir is squeezed
  • DuoLock™ cap keeps spout dirt-free
  • Durable film reservoir holds 1L of water
  • Shake-to-clean design maintains fast flow rates without back-flishing
name: Platypus QuickDraw 1L Bottle
